TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputRadioButton extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputRadioButton Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用控制項來建立網頁上的選項按鈕。Use the control to create a radio button on a Web page. 控制項不提供內建功能，以便顯示選項按鈕的標題。The control does not provide built-in functionality to display a caption for the radio button. 若要建立標題，請在網頁所需的位置中使用常值文字。To create a caption, use literal text in the Web page at the desired location. 這可讓您判斷標題相對於選項按鈕的顯示位置。This allows you to determine where the caption is displayed relative to the radio button. 例如，如果您想要顯示的選項按鈕右邊的標題，將宣告控制項，後面的標題文字，如下列程式碼所示。For example, if you want to display the caption on the right side of the radio button, declare an control, followed by the caption text, as shown in the following code. ``` Caption Text
``` 您可以選擇性地建立關聯的數量與藉由設定控制屬性。You can optionally associate a quantity with the control by setting the property. 當您有多個選項按鈕，而且需要執行的計算，根據選取範圍，這非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation, based on the selection. 控制項可以群組在一起所指定的通用值屬性的每個您想要在群組中包含的選項按鈕。 controls can be grouped together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 當您群組控制項群組，一個選項按鈕群組中可以選取一次。When you group controls together, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 若要判斷是否選取控制項時，請測試屬性。To determine whether the control is selected, test the property. 如果您有一群控制項，您必須逐一查看控制項並測試個別控制每個屬性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 控制項提供事件所引發的時機屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式執行一組特定的指示，當引發事件時，例如資料驗證。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised, such as data validation. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立一組選項按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a group of radio buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: HtmlInputRadioButton();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Radio"常值字串。The "radio" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonctorvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool Checked
Public Property Checked As Boolean
public: property bool Checked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已選取 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is selected.

value.span: 如果 已經選取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否選取控制項。Use the property to determine whether the control is selected. 如果您有一群控制項，您必須逐一查看控制項並測試個別控制每個屬性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 您也可以使用這個屬性來以程式設計方式指定控制項是否已選取。You can also use this property to programmatically specify whether the control is selected. 您可以將群組控制項群組所指定的通用值的每個您想要在群組中包含的選項按鈕控制項的屬性。You can group controls together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button control you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 當您群組可以一次選取一個選項按鈕群組中的控制項。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 選定控制項的屬性設定為`true`，而相同的屬性設定為`false`群組中的所有其他選項按鈕。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來決定要選取群組中的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which radio button in the group is selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 處理 控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果回傳的結果改變了 控制項的狀態，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否的回傳值控制項不同於先前的值，以及如果是的話，會傳回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定與 類別執行個體關聯的群組名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the group that the instance of the class is associated with.

value.span: 核取方塊控制項群組， 類別的執行個體是這個群組的成員。

span.span: The group of check box controls that the instance of the class is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 群組多個控制項，藉由指定的通用值屬性的每個您想要在群組中包含的選項按鈕。Group multiple controls by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. 當您群組可以一次選取一個選項按鈕群組中的控制項。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 選定控制項的屬性設定為`true`，而相同的屬性設定為`false`群組中的所有其他選項按鈕。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用將多個屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to group multiple controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件並將 控制項註冊為需要回傳處理的控制項。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the control as one that requires postback handling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使其將`Title`中自訂屬性伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it adds a `Title` attribute in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 這允許您在事件引發時建立自訂事件處理常式。

span.span: This allows you to create a custom event handler when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時屬性控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The event is raised when the property of the control changes values between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式會執行一組特定的指示 （例如資料驗證） 時引發事件時。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要啟用 Web Form 網頁上的所有控制項檢視狀態，屬性`true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 您也可以藉由設定啟用個別的控制項檢視狀態的屬性`true`。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自訂事件處理常式更新以顯示選取的選項按鈕的值在網頁上的標籤。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Calls the method to signal the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確地引發事件。

summary.span: 將 控制項屬性呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入屬性的屬性當做控制，然後再呼叫基底類別的方法The method writes the property as an attribute of the control and then calls the base class's method 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，以便指定標題文字一律會顯示為。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在 控制項的 屬性的值在傳送至伺服器期間變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時屬性控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The event is raised when the property of the control changes value between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式會執行一組特定的指示 （例如資料驗證） 時引發事件時。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要啟用 Web Form 網頁上的所有控制項檢視狀態，屬性`true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 您也可以藉由設定啟用個別的控制項檢視狀態的屬性`true`。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自訂事件處理常式更新以顯示選取的選項按鈕的值在網頁上的標籤。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Value { get; set; }
.property instance string Value
Public Overrides Property Value As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 控制項關聯的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the control.

value.span: 與 控制項關聯的值。

span.span: The value associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷與相關聯的值控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the value associated with the control. 值可以是任何有效的字串，您想要與控制項產生關聯。The value can be any valid string that you want to associate with the control. 當您有多個選項按鈕，而且需要執行選取項目為基礎的計算，這非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation based on the selection. 例如，您可以代表不同的傳送方法的選項按鈕。For example, you can have radio buttons that represent different shipping methods. 您可以儲存在運輸成本屬性。You can store the shipping cost in the property. 當使用者選取傳送方法時，可以由這個屬性適當的傳送量，並加入至銷售總額。When the user selects the shipping method, the appropriate shipping amount can be determined from this property and added to the sales total. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用相關聯的描述屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a description with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)]
